trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Elérhetővé teszi <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> típust [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Ez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>a memóriában marad, amíg a társított <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>megsemmisül.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>A metódus és a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A> későbbi hívásainak visszaadott</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> példányát

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: A társ típusát határozza meg a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>virtuális visszahívás.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is created, and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>nem valósítja meg a visszahívást nem <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>jön létre, és ez a metódus visszaadja `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A létrehozott <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> was not created by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*> method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>; vagy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> nem hozta létre a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a gyorsító kulcsa a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: A <> </> *> ad vissza, amely <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a hozzáférési kulcsot a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>. Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A hozzáférési kulcsot a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlőtípusra a következő lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> számbavételi érték.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a karakterláncot, amely egyedileg azonosítja a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: A <> </> *> ad vissza, amely <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> a határoló négyszög jelöli, amelyek a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the coordinates of the element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> , hogy az elem koordinátáit tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, if the element is not both a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>, this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: Nem kötelező Ha az elem nem is egy <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> és egy <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>, ez a módszer <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*> adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjtemény elemeinek gyermek lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: A list of child <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: A gyermek listáját <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> elemek.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a nevét a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.String>karakterlánc.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> a kattintható területet, amely a jelöli, amelyek a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that allows a click.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> azon az elemén, amely lehetővé teszi egy kattintással.

trans-unit.source: The point values are (<xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>) if the element is not both a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A pont értékei (<xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>) Ha az elem nem is egy <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> és egy <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc, amely funkcióinak lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the string that returns is the same text that the control provides in the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc, amely visszaadja általában ugyanannak a szövegnek a tooltip vezérlő nyújt.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterláncot, amely tartalmazza a <> </> *> ad vissza, amely <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that communicates the visual status of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Karakterlánc, amely kommunikál a vizuális állapotának lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact can be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Például egy messenger kapcsolattartó állapotát "Foglalt" vagy "Online" lehet.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterláncot, amely tartalmazza a <> </> *> ad vissza, amely <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the item type that the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a emberek számára olvasható karakterlánc, amely tartalmazza az elemet, írja be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> jelöli.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: String examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Karakterlánc például a következők: "Üzenet", "Ügyfél" és "Dokumentumok".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterláncot, amely tartalmazza a <> </> *> ad vissza, amely <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> céloz meg elem a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: The element targeting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, but it does not have to be.
trans-unit.target: Az elem célcsoport-kezelési a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>lehet egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, de nem rendelkezik.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> property will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>beállításánál a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A>tulajdonság automatikusan beállítja a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A>is tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> céloz meg elem a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A felirat a lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A>tulajdonság funkciók hasonló karakterlánc, amely felhasználói vezérlő ismertetik azokat hivatkozunk.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Győződjön meg arról, hogy rendelkezik-e az összes vezérlőjének képviselő szöveges alakot a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] , hogy a programozott módon hivatkozhat a vezérlő honosított módon.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterláncot, amely tartalmazza a <> </> *> ad vissza, amely <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> adott irányba elrendezését.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"> </xref> számbavételi érték.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő mintát lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Az enumerálás egy értéket.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the interface if patternInterface is ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Egy objektum, amely megvalósítja a felhasználói felületén, patternInterface van ; ellenkező esetben .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> jelenleg rendelkezik billentyűzet beviteli fókuszba.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az elem bemeneti billentyűzetfókusz; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> egy eleme, amely a felhasználó számára látható adatokat tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdez vagy beállít egy értéket, amely jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> értendő, interaktív felhasználó.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Szükség esetén előfordulhat, hogy ismer a felhasználó a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> , a vezérlő logikai struktúráját hozzájárul a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> billentyűzetfókusz fogad el.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that contains the value of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*> értékét, amely tartalmazza

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> billentyűzetfókusz fogad el.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is focusable by the keyboard; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az elem fókuszt felvenni képes által a billentyűzet; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> ki van kapcsolva a képernyőn.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság nem adja meg, hogy az elem látható.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: Bizonyos esetekben egy elem a képernyőn, de még mindig nem látható.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Például ha az elem a képernyőn, azonban más összetevők által rejtett, akkor előfordulhat, hogy nem lesz látható.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ebben az esetben a metódus visszaadja `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az elem nem a képernyőn; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> védett tartalom szerepel.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is required to be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> az űrlap kell végrehajtani.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that contains the value that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>, if it's set; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> által visszaadott értéket tartalmazza, amelyek <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>, ha a beállítás; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti billentyűzetfókusz állítja be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
